quote: Don't cry because it's over. Smile because it happened.
author: Dr. Seuss

quote: Too often we underestimate the power of a touch, a smile, a kind word, a listening ear, an honest compliment, or the smallest act of caring, all of which have the potential to turn a life around.
author: Leo Buscaglia

quote: Smile, it's free therapy.
author: Douglas Horton
The real man smiles in trouble, gathers strength from distress, and grows brave by reflection.

quote: Colors are the smiles of nature.
author: Leigh Hunt

quote: Look back, and smile on perils past.
author: Walter Scott

quote: Smile in the mirror. Do that every morning and you'll start to see a big difference in your life.
author: Yoko Ono

quote: After every storm the sun will smile; for every problem there is a solution, and the soul's indefeasible duty is to be of good cheer.
author: William R. Alger

quote: Always keep your smile. That's how I explain my long life.
author: Jeanne Calment

quote: They might not need me; but they might. I'll let my head be just in sight; a smile as small as mine might be precisely their necessity.
author: Emily Dickinson

quote: A smile is the universal welcome.
author: Max Eastman

quote: If you smile when no one else is around, you really mean it.
author: Andy Rooney

quote: A kind heart is a fountain of gladness, making everything in its vicinity freshen into smiles.
author: Washington Irving

quote: Wear a smile and have friends; wear a scowl and have wrinkles.
author: George Eliot

quote: I never smile unless I mean it.
author: Donny Osmond

quote: A smile is the chosen vehicle of all ambiguities.
author: Herman Melville

quote: Nobody needs a smile so much as the one who has none to give. So get used to smiling heart-warming smiles, and you will spread sunshine in a sometimes dreary world.
author: Lawrence G. Lovasik

quote: It is impossible to persuade a man who does not disagree, but smiles.
author: Muriel Spark

quote: But God can only smile because only God can know what is coming next.
author: Desmond Tutu

quote: Smile, for everyone lacks self-confidence and more than any other one thing a smile reassures them.
author: Andre Maurois

quote: Laughter is day, and sobriety is night; a smile is the twilight that hovers gently between both, more bewitching than either.
author: Henry Ward Beecher

quote: I have witnessed the softening of the hardest of hearts by a simple smile.
author: Goldie Hawn

quote: The flower in the vase smiles, but no longer laughs.
author: Malcolm de Chazal

quote: Courage, not compromise, brings the smile of God's approval.
author: Thomas S. Monson

quote: The company of fools may first make us smile, but in the end we always feel melancholy.
author: Oliver Goldsmith

quote: If you haven't seen your wife smile at a traffic cop, you haven't seen her smile her prettiest.
author: Kin Hubbard

quote: Jesus wept; Voltaire smiled. From that divine tear and from that human smile is derived the grace of present civilization.
author: Victor Hugo

quote: To smile at the jest which plants a thorn in another's breast is to become a principal in the mischief.
author: Richard Brinsley Sheridan

quote: I have found that a smile and a stick will carry you through all right, and in ninety-nine cases out of a hundred it is the smile that does the trick.
author: Robert Powell
Beauty is power; a smile is its sword.

quote: A smile is a curve that sets everything straight.
author: Phyllis Diller

quote: Let my soul smile through my heart and my heart smile through my eyes, that I may scatter rich smiles in sad hearts.
author: Paramahansa Yogananda

quote: A warm smile is the universal language of kindness.
author: William Arthur Ward

quote: A smile is the light in your window that tells others that there is a caring, sharing person inside.
author: Denis Waitley

quote: A smile is happiness you'll find right under your nose.
author: Tom Wilson

quote: Be thou the rainbow in the storms of life. The evening beam that smiles the clouds away, and tints tomorrow with prophetic ray.
author: Lord Byron

quote: A gentle word, a kind look, a good-natured smile can work wonders and accomplish miracles.
author: William Hazlitt

quote: Wrinkles will only go where the smiles have been.
author: Jimmy Buffett

quote: Smiling is definitely one of the best beauty remedies. If you have a good sense of humor and a good approach to life, that's beautiful.
author: Rashida Jones

quote: I'm really exciting. I smile a lot, I win a lot, and I'm really sexy.
author: Serena Williams

quote: What sunshine is to flowers, smiles are to humanity. These are but trifles, to be sure; but scattered along life's pathway, the good they do is inconceivable.
author: Joseph Addison
Remember even though the outside world might be raining, if you keep on smiling the sun will soon show its face and smile back at you.

quote: I want to touch the heart of the world and make it smile.
author: Charles de Lint

quote: I think that anybody that smiles automatically looks better.
author: Diane Lane

quote: The happiness of life is made up of minute fractions - the little, soon forgotten charities of a kiss or a smile, a kind look or heartfelt compliment.
author: Samuel Taylor Coleridge

quote: If the world's a veil of tears, Smile till rainbows span it.
author: Lucy Larcom

quote: Children learn to smile from their parents.
author: Shinichi Suzuki

quote: When I look out at the people and they look at me and they're smiling, then I know that I'm loved. That is the time when I have no worries, no problems.
author: Etta James

quote: Better by far you should forget and smile that you should remember and be sad.
author: Christina Rossetti
A smile abroad is often a scowl at home.

quote: Youth smiles without any reason. It is one of its chiefest charms.
author: Thomas Gray

quote: She gave me a smile I could feel in my hip pocket.
author: Raymond Chandler

quote: I've always spent more time with a smile on my face than not, but the thing is, I don't write about it.
author: Robert Smith

quote: Never a lip is curved with pain that can't be kissed into smiles again.
author: Bret Harte

quote: I was so embarrassed about mispronouncing words. I just knew how to smile.
author: Adriana Lima

quote: As happy a man as any in the world, for the whole world seems to smile upon me!
author: Samuel Pepys

quote: We shall never know all the good that a simple smile can do.
author: Mother Teresa

quote: And the smile that is worth the praises of earth is the smile that shines through tears.
author: Ella Wheeler Wilcox

quote: Let us always meet each other with smile, for the smile is the beginning of love.
author: Mother Teresa

quote: A woman whose smile is open and whose expression is glad has a kind of beauty no matter what she wears.
author: Anne Roiphe
